    GameConfig - Static configuration class for game settings.

    GameController - Class in com.comp2042.controller
    Orchestrates core Tetris gameplay, translating input events into board updates, managing scoring and level progression, and notifying the UI controller of state changes and game outcomes.
    GameController(GuiController, Board) - Constructor for class com.comp2042.controller.GameController
    Constructs a game controller bound to a specific UI controller and board implementation.
    GameController.Shard - Class in com.comp2042.controller
    Particle effect representing a single shard emitted from a cleared block.
    GameController.WhiteFlash - Class in com.comp2042.controller
    Visual effect representing a brief white flash across a cleared row.
